sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const HowToPlay = () => { return(

HOW TO PLAY!

Welcome to MINI TURBO RACERS! Wondering how to play? You're in the right place!

Place a bet!

Place a bet on the car you think will win! If it wins you'll double your money! If it comes last you'll lose all the coins you bet!

How do I win?

The cars cannot be controlled so how do you win? You have to buy power-ups and place blocks to slow down other cars! Good ol' fashioned sabotage!

What if I run out of coins?

Head on over to the bank and play the slot machines, rumour has it they give away a lot of coins!

) } export default HowToPlay;
